changelog.change: Added "Windows Graphics Capture" support for hardware-accelerated windows. Added fix for PC version having black frames in between load screens.

Tweaked the detection parameters a bit to hopefully prevent misdetections when entering levels from the level select menu. Added some checks to prevent crashes when invalid values are set for the capture region. Added checkbox for detailed logs. These can be enabled to get more information about the load remover state at every frame in the log files. (Only enable that setting if necessary for analysis/debugging, it's costly performance wise.)
Reworked the detection to use gradients as well. This should work for all languages ideally, but needs testing.
Made the detection of the blue/black swirl more lenient.
Initial version of the "Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time" load remover for the full game. Should ideally work out-of-the box if you choose your capture region and scaling correctly.
